extensionDescription.message: Watch YouTube videos in a pop-up window.

popupTitle.description: Title displayed in the popup header

currentPageTab.description: Tab label for current page videos

clickVideoMessage.message: Click on a video below to open it in a pop-up.

historyMessage.message: Your recently opened videos will appear here.

noVideosFound.message: Couldn't find any videos on this page. Navigate to a YouTube page with videos.
noVideosFound.description: Error message when no videos are found

noVideosOnPage.message: No videos found on this page.
noVideosOnPage.description: Message when no videos are detected on current page

clickToOpenPopup.message: Click a video to open it in a pop-up.

navigateToYouTube.message: Please navigate to YouTube to use this extension.

noHistoryYet.message: No videos in history yet. Open some videos in pop-up to see them here!

historyCount.message: $COUNT$ video(s) in your history. Click to reopen in pop-up.
historyCount.description: Message showing number of videos in history

durationUnknown.description: Label when video duration is unknown

opened.description: Label showing when video was opened

popupButtonTitle.description: Tooltip for the popup button on YouTube video player

errorGettingHistory.description: Error message when history fails to load

historyDurationHelp.message: Automatically remove videos older than selected time

clearHistoryHelp.description: Help text for clear history button

autoFocusHelp.message: Automatically bring pop-up window to foreground

rememberWindowStateLabel.description: Label for remember window state setting

rememberWindowStateHelp.message: Save window changes for next time
rememberWindowStateHelp.description: Help text for remember window state

settingsSaved.description: Success message when settings are saved

confirmReset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values?

confirmClearHistory.message: Are you sure you want to clear all video history? This cannot be undone.

historyClearedSuccess.description: Success message when history is cleared

errorLoadingSettings.description: Error message when settings fail to load

errorSavingSettings.description: Error message when settings fail to save

errorClearingHistory.description: Error message when history clearing fails

invalidWindowWidth.message: Window width must be between 400 and 2000 pixels

invalidWindowHeight.message: Window height must be between 300 and 1500 pixels

invalidHistoryLimit.message: History limit must be between 10 and 200 videos

noSearchResults.description: Message when search returns no results

geminiApiKeyHelp.message: Enter your personal Gemini API key to enable AI assistant features
geminiApiKeyHelp.description: Help text for API key input

apiKeyPlaceholder.message: Enter your Gemini API key here...

apiKeyInstructionsTitle.message: How to get your API key:

apiKeyStep2.message: Sign in with your Google account

apiKeyStep3.message: Click 'Create API Key' or 'Get API Key'

apiKeyStep5.message: Paste it in the field above and save settings

getApiKeyLink.message: ðŸ”— Get your API key from Google AI Studio

noApiKeyMessage.message: Please set your Google Gemini API Key to use AI features.
noApiKeyMessage.description: Message when API key is not set

promptPlaceholder.message: Ask me anything about YouTube videos...

aiErrorMessage.message: Failed to get response. Please check your API key and try again.

aiWelcomeMessage.message: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. Ask me anything!
